Package lib.homies.framework.menu

Interface MenuManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpigotMenuManager
public interface MenuManager
A platform-agnostic interface for managing menus. This service allows framework developers to open, close, and register custom menus.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    closeMenu(HomiesPlayer player)
    Closes the currently open menu for a given player.
    HomiesMenu
    getMenu(String id)
    Retrieves a registered menu by its unique ID.
    void
    openMenu(HomiesPlayer player, HomiesMenu menu)
    Opens a specific menu for a given player.
    void
    registerMenu(String id, HomiesMenu menu)
    Registers a menu with a unique ID, allowing it to be retrieved later.

  • Method Details

    • openMenu

      void openMenu(HomiesPlayer player, HomiesMenu menu)
      Opens a specific menu for a given player.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer for whom to open the menu.
      menu - The HomiesMenu instance to open.

    • closeMenu

      void closeMenu(HomiesPlayer player)
      Closes the currently open menu for a given player. If the player does not have a menu open, this method does nothing.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer for whom to close the menu.

    • registerMenu

      void registerMenu(String id, HomiesMenu menu)
      Registers a menu with a unique ID, allowing it to be retrieved later. This is useful for menus that are accessed by ID (e.g., via commands).
      Parameters:
      id - A unique string identifier for the menu.
      menu - The HomiesMenu instance to register.

    • getMenu

      HomiesMenu getMenu(String id)
      Retrieves a registered menu by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique string identifier of the menu.
      Returns:
      The HomiesMenu instance if found, otherwise null.
